name: RemoveProjectDomain
description:
Removes a domain from a specified project.

Use this tool to remove a domain from a Vercel project by specifying the project's ID or name along with the domain name.

parameters.name: project_id_or_name
parameters.description: The unique project identifier or name to specify which project's domain is to be removed.

value_schema.description: The unique project identifier or the project name

parameters.name: project_domain_name
parameters.description: The domain name of the project to be removed.

parameters.name: team_identifier
parameters.description: The identifier for the team on whose behalf the request is performed.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: team_slug
parameters.description: The slug identifier of the team to perform the request on behalf of. Used to specify which team's project domain should be removed.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: remove_redirects
parameters.description: Set to true to remove all domains from the project that redirect to the domain being removed.

value_schema.description: Whether to remove all domains from this project that redirect to the domain being removed.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the vercel API.

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: idOrName
parameters.description: The unique project identifier or the project name

value_schema.description: The unique project identifier or the project name

parameters.name: removeRedirects
parameters.description: Whether to remove all domains from this project that redirect to the domain being removed.

value_schema.description: Whether to remove all domains from this project that redirect to the domain being removed.
